# Poker PWA - Interactive Hand Analysis Quiz

## Project Overview
This is a Progressive Web App for learning poker hand analysis through interactive quizzes. The app generates random poker situations and tests users on hand strength, outs, equity calculations, and identifying the nuts.

## Key Features
- PWA support with offline capability
- Random poker situation generator
- Interactive multiple choice quiz system
- Detailed hand analysis with equity breakdowns
- 4-color deck display for clarity

## File Structure
- `index.html` - Main page structure
- `app.js` - Core poker logic and quiz functionality
- `style.css` - Styling and layout
- `manifest.json` - PWA configuration
- `service-worker.js` - Offline support
- `README.md` - Documentation

## Development Notes
- Pure HTML/CSS/JavaScript implementation
- No external dependencies or frameworks
- Service worker enables offline functionality
- Responsive design for mobile devices
